name: Sacrificial
description:
On hit, after combat, user may pay 3 TP to apply [Vulnerable] to target foe until the end of target foe’s next combat this turn.

Decreases Max TP by 4 when placed in unit’s Inventory. (Penalty can only be removed using Restore once traded to another Unit.)

If weapon is an Axe, Lance, or Sword with the Ranged property, ignore Mt penalty.

Disabled on spells, Brawl, Bows.

modifiers.tpcost: fill affirm([Sacrefice?], label [On Hit, After Combat] {3}, 0)

comment: Items in modifers should be integers
